entry.title: Writing Octopress blog posts using markdown
entry.content:
Hello Octopress! This an example post for more information see:

Blockquote

Don’t stop when you’re tired, stop when you’re done.

@TheJeetBanerjee http://twitter.com/TheJeetBanerjee

We have to go for what we think we’re fully capable of, not limit ourselves by what we’ve been in the past.

@Vivek Paul

Ruby

```ruby class A def abc

puts 'hii'

end end ```

Console

console $ sudo apt-get install cakePHP $ git clone git@github.com:imathis/octopress.git # fork octopress

Coffeescript

```coffeescript $(‘.help’).html “(?)” console.log “print something”

```

Gist Embedding

Include Code Snippets

File /home/sandip/octopress/source/downloads/code/[linenos:false] could not be found

Selecting tags from sentence

This is a ruby and rails blog

Pullquote

Surround your pullquote like this {" text to be quoted "}

Images

http://placekitten.com/890/280">

AngularJS Tutorial – YouTube

AngularJS is a client-side JavaScript framework.A video tutorial to help you get started with AngularJS.

About Author

http://www.gravatar.com/avatar/37e0a0772ffc4ce993cedfb49c6ee6d2.png" title="Sandip Ransing" > Sandip is a ruby on rails developer based in pune and also a blogger at funonrails. Opensource contributor and working with Josh software. Follow Sandip on Twitter for updates. He shares code at github.
